Welcome to the Web Magnetic Blog!

Nov 7, 2015

Web Magnetic has launched a new website! The site was built using Jekyll which is an awesome static site generator that gives you the option to incorporate blog posts into your site without using a database. You can check out Jekyll here but here is how you get Jekyll up and running quickly.
